ygData.subject: Oracle Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 2 Date: Mon, 6 Mar 2000 15:32:45 -0500 From: Michael Calhoun  Subject: Re: re: Oracle Robe ... Kodros Cicero Hmmm...I m not sure
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 2
Date: Mon, 6 Mar 2000 15:32:45 -0500
From: "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...>
Subject: Re: re: Oracle Robe

>It was on the Prexus Server. I was pretty pissed since I was planning to
>get one soon. I figured that it was becoming too easy for higher lvls to
>get. Maybe now it will be part of a quest.

Kodros Cicero

Hmmm...I'm not sure about it getting "easy". =) I never actually fought for
mine myself...didn't want to mess with my faction. I ended up buying it for
the going rate on Veeshan, which was about 1000pp.

-- Lim'Dul
